rows.label: qst702001_msg0001
rows.name: Ohhhh...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0002
rows.name:
What could be happening
over there...? But I can't
just go off, can I...?

rows.label: qst702001_msg0003
rows.name: What's wrong, Mars? You look troubled.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0004
rows.name: Adel-sama!

rows.label: qst702001_msg0005
rows.name: No, it's just that...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0006
rows.name: Ah, no! Sorry! Nothing's wrong!

rows.label: qst702001_msg0007
rows.name:
You definitely sounded like something
was wrong when you were mumbling to
yourself a minute ago. Just spill it, man.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0008
rows.name: Nothing gets past you, Lord...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0009
rows.name:
I'm just worried about causing you
extra hassle, Lord. Don't want to
burden you unnecessarily, I mean...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0010
rows.name:
That isn't for you to worry about.
Go on now, let's hear it all.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0011
rows.name: If you say so. Well, what it is, is...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0012
rows.name:
Is that my wife and kids are
still back in Gula, you see.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0013
rows.name:
But you hear all kinds of
troubling news out of the
motherland lately...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0014
rows.name:
So you can probably understand why
I'm worried. At the same time, I'm
the chief Gulan overseer here...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0015
rows.name:
So it's not like I can go check on them
myself... But you've been there, haven't
you, Lord? How was the situation?

rows.label: qst702001_msg0016
rows.name:
...You've asked a hard
question, friend.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0017
rows.name:
Shiyan remnant troops have looted
a number of villages there, it's
true. Some were hit quite hard...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0018
rows.name:
I understand how you feel. If it was me,
and Aletta was in that kind of piteous
circumstance, I too couldn't rest easy...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0019
rows.name:
Thank you for saying so, Lord...
Well, so long as my village of Torigo
is well, I give God my thanks...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0020
rows.name: Torigo...?

rows.label: qst702001_msg0022
rows.name: Adel... We have to tell him the truth.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0023
rows.name: Torigo was...burned to cinders.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0024
rows.name: That's...impossible...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0025
rows.name: Kai...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0026
rows.name: Kei...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0027
rows.name: And Nelly... I can't believe it...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0028
rows.name: Kai and Kei, you said?

rows.label: qst702001_msg0029
rows.name: Are those your children's names?

rows.label: qst702001_msg0030
rows.name:
Y-yes, Adel-sama...
But, how did you...?

rows.label: qst702001_msg0031
rows.name:
We've met a Kai and Kei
during our travels.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0032
rows.name:
They were unharmed, and awaiting
their father to come and get them.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0033
rows.name: Oh, thank goodness!

rows.label: qst702001_msg0034
rows.name: Adel-sama... Would...would you...?

rows.label: qst702001_msg0035
rows.name:
Of course, Mars. We'll bring
your little ones back to you.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0036
rows.name:
...Ohh, Adel-sama! Thank
you...thank you so much...

rows.label: qst702001_msg0037
rows.name:
So Mars was the father that Kai-kun
and Kei-chan were talking about.

rows.label: qst702001_msg0038
rows.name:
They were in the Seigle Fell
encampment, weren't they?

rows.label: qst702001_msg0039
rows.name: Well remembered. Let us hurry, then.
